entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
